translation.zh: ‎他是其中一个编剧 ‎拥有语言学背景

translation.zh: ‎他把一本完整的小词典交给我

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎他用波丁语给我写了一封电邮

translation.zh: ‎我心想：“这是在写什么？”

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎每个人都积极参与

translation.zh: ‎每个想法都不能忽略

translation.zh: ‎例如弓箭手要怎么射箭

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这一幕交给了天才编剧薇薇安处理

translation.zh:

translation.en: Having written a Star Trek movie, I know what it's like when you write,
translation.zh:
‎我曾为《星际迷航》写剧本 ‎我知道编剧笔下的

translation.en: "And such-and-such lands on such-and-such planet."
translation.zh:
‎我知道编剧笔下的
‎“某个星球上的某种地形”是什么情况

translation.en: And you know someone's gonna have to go build that, or design it or, or all of those things.
translation.zh: ‎总会有人负责去建造或设计这些场景

translation.en: But I think, as a writer, you have to trust in the process.
translation.zh: ‎不过我认为编剧应该要相信摄制组

translation.en: You can't think about the designers and the builders.
translation.zh: ‎不能代替设计师或建造师去考虑

translation.en: They have to take care of themselves.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟这是他们的职责

translation.en: You write whatever the heck you wanna write.
translation.zh: ‎想写什么就写什么

translation.en: However vast and expansive it is, you just write it
translation.zh: ‎无论场景多大或经费多高 ‎写出来就对了

translation.en: and let them tell you they can't do it.
translation.zh: ‎他们做不到自然会告诉你

translation.en: It's not your problem.
translation.zh: ‎不是你的问题

translation.en: For Dark Crystal to be able to work,

translation.en: we had to have that full trust in the creative vision.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须全然相信这个创作愿景

translation.en: I don't know where else you could make an epic,
translation.zh:
‎我不知道除了我们以外
‎还有谁能创造出

translation.en: action, adventure, fantasy, romance, story of love
translation.zh:
‎这种集动作冒险、幻想
‎爱情和布偶于一身的经典了

translation.zh:
‎这种集动作冒险、幻想
‎爱情和布偶于一身的经典了 ‎而且必须是经典

translation.en: The mantra is freedom and responsibility.
translation.zh: ‎我们的核心价值观是自由和责任

translation.zh: ‎Netflix中不同阶级的职员

translation.en: do have a lot of freedom to do their jobs how they see fit,
translation.zh:
‎都拥有许多自由 ‎去做他们适合的工作
‎不过必须有责任感

translation.en: but you're accountable.
translation.zh:
‎去做他们适合的工作
‎不过必须有责任感

translation.en: So, there's a responsibility for delivering at a really high level.
translation.zh: ‎要交出高品质作品少不了责任

translation.en: And we extend that same mantra to our filmmakers.
translation.zh: ‎我们也把这个核心价值观 ‎传达给制作人和导演

translation.en: [Taron] Before I was an actor,
translation.zh: ‎我成为演员前

translation.en: the thing that really sort of set my soul on fire was drawing, and sculpting, and making characters.
translation.zh:
‎我到从心底对画画
‎雕塑和人物塑造充满热忱

translation.en: and that's sort of what I thought my life was going to be about.
translation.zh: ‎我以为日后会成为这方面的人才

translation.en: And I just remembered the first time that I opened the printout
translation.zh: ‎我记得第一次翻开剧本

translation.en: with the character breakdown and the little image,
translation.zh: ‎里面有人物分析和图像

translation.en: that I just called, like, anyone who I thought might be interested
translation.zh: ‎马上就打给所有感兴趣加入的人

translation.en: to tell them about it, because it was just the coolest thing.
translation.zh: ‎告诉他们这件事 ‎毕竟这是再酷好不过的事

translation.en: There's something to be said about the way something is moving in real space,
translation.zh: ‎在真实空间里运动的实物有某种特色

translation.en: with the light catching it and that tactile sense,
translation.zh: ‎尤其是它们的感光表现、真实感

translation.en: then bringing it to life.
translation.zh: ‎这一切让角色活了起来

translation.en: [Lisa] We were nervous about doing puppet Gelfling,
translation.zh: ‎我们制作葛弗林人布偶时特别紧张

translation.en: and it came from my father's concern
translation.zh: ‎这也是我父亲的担忧

translation.en: that the Gelfling hadn't been entirely successful in the first movie.
translation.zh:
‎他认为原版电影中的葛弗林人布偶
‎不是十分理想

translation.en: The designs were beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎外型设计固然漂亮

translation.en: I mean, Wendy did an incredible job,
translation.zh: ‎文迪的手工无法挑剔

translation.en: but, like, the movement was not quite what he wanted.
translation.zh: ‎但是布偶的动作与他想象中有差

translation.en: They were sure that they were gonna be able to do things that were far easier, far better,
translation.zh:
‎他们起初坚信可以用更简单的方式
‎做出更理想的布偶

translation.en: it wouldn't be difficult this time.
translation.zh: ‎以为这次不会遇上困难

translation.en: And they ran into the same problems,
translation.zh: ‎结果依然碰上同样的问题

translation.en: because, basically, it's a hand in a very small head,
translation.zh:
‎毕竟布偶师
‎要把手伸进一个很小的头里

translation.en: and there isn't a lot you can do with that.
translation.zh: ‎因此有很多限制

translation.en: You still need to have a lot of room for mechanisms up above
translation.zh: ‎头部依然需要添加许多操控机制

translation.en: and enough room for a hand to manipulate the mouth.
translation.zh:
‎也确保手有足够的空间
‎操控布偶的嘴形

translation.en: I think what's going to step up our new characters
translation.zh: ‎要让新人物更加出彩

translation.en: is how we were able to get the character into the eyes and into the skin texture.
translation.zh: ‎就必须加强他们的眼神和皮肤质感

translation.en: We think the Gelflings are so much improved,
translation.zh: ‎新造的葛弗林人布偶比以前好多了

translation.en: it's almost hard to look back and remember
translation.zh: ‎我现在已经忘记了

translation.en: why I was nervous about doing puppet Gelfling.
translation.zh:
‎当初担心葛弗林人布偶
‎做得不够好的感觉

translation.en: But my father was nervous enough about it
translation.zh: ‎不过我父亲以前确实非常担心这点

translation.en: that he wanted to cast humans in Labyrinth.
translation.zh: ‎所以才想采用演员出演《魔幻迷宫》

translation.en: [John] Don't get me wrong, the original stuff is magical in its own right.
translation.zh: ‎别误会了 ‎原著本身就充满了奇幻魅力

translation.en: You know, back then, they would carve out fingers out of wood.
translation.zh: ‎以前人们用人手把木头刻成手指

translation.en: Now we're-- we have 3D printed fingers, um, out of plastic.
translation.zh: ‎如今我们有3D打印的塑料手指

translation.en: It's really... the design is fundamentally based on what we know they built on the original movie,
translation.zh: ‎造型设计基本上是基于原版电影

translation.en: um, which is basically this skull...
translation.zh: ‎基本上这个头颅

translation.en: or partial skull...
translation.zh: ‎或者是部分头颅

translation.en: um, with the teeth mounted kind of below it on a wire.
translation.zh: ‎用线把牙齿固定在下面

translation.en: And you think it's not bad,
translation.zh: ‎我们以为不错了

translation.en: but a puppeteer has to have it on their hand for hours.
translation.zh:
‎但是必须考虑到
‎布偶师要套在手上好几个小时

translation.en: But the skins, um, are foam-latex,
translation.zh: ‎皮肤的材料是泡沫乳胶

translation.en: um, as they were on the original,
translation.zh: ‎原版电影也是采用同一种材料

translation.en: um, which is very light, uh, and flexible, uh, material.
translation.zh: ‎这种材质非常轻盈 而且有弹性

translation.en: This is the core,
translation.zh: ‎这是头颅核心部分

translation.en: and... and this is the actual, uh, detail itself inside.
translation.zh: ‎翻过来可以看到皮肤表层细节

translation.en: So, it's got... we've got two molds going on here in... in theory.
translation.zh: ‎所以基本上有两个模具

translation.en: So, this is the core mold,
translation.zh: ‎这是主要模具

translation.en: which we get our fiberglass outside that goes inside it
translation.zh: ‎采用玻璃纤维制成

translation.en: for the animatronics,
translation.zh: ‎里面会植入机械

translation.en: and inside here is the detail.
translation.zh: ‎翻过来可以看到细节

translation.en: [Jasper] The inside... of the skin is actually
translation.zh: ‎皮肤内层的形状

translation.en: exactly the same shape as the outside of the skull.
translation.zh: ‎跟头颅外层的形状是一样的

translation.en: So, I cut this character in half right there,
translation.zh: ‎假设把这个人物的头颅切成一半

translation.en: and what that does is it allows me to make a tray.
translation.zh: ‎就形成了一个托盘

translation.en: And from that tray, I just start building off.
translation.zh: ‎我可以开始在这个托盘上进行建造

translation.en: So, this is the main hero Aughra puppet, um,
translation.zh: ‎这是主要人物奥古拉的布偶

translation.en: that Kevin uses most often. Um...
translation.zh: ‎凯文经常会用到

translation.en: But, um, this is sort of its clone.
translation.zh: ‎这是复制品

translation.en: Um, she has a foam latex skin,
translation.zh: ‎采用泡沫乳胶制成

translation.en: uh, like the original did.
translation.zh: ‎就跟原版电影一样

translation.en: And then, inside, she ends up with, uh, her ugly Aughra teeth
translation.zh: ‎里面是奥古拉难看的牙齿

translation.en: and a foam mouth a lot like that one.
translation.zh: ‎嘴巴也是采用泡沫乳胶制成

translation.en: So, he grips it like this.
translation.zh: ‎凯文用手这么抓住它

translation.en: And is able to make her talk that way. But then, there is...
translation.zh: ‎让她动嘴说话 ‎此外还有个无线遥控器

translation.en: additionally, there is a radio control that gives a second puppeteer expression
translation.zh: ‎此外还有个无线遥控器 ‎通过控制眉毛和眼睛的活动

translation.en: over her eyebrows and her eye.
translation.zh: ‎为布偶增添另一层表情

translation.en: Technology is great. There are a lot of things that you can do now that you couldn't do then,
translation.zh:
‎科技进步是好事
‎很多事以前办不到 如今却办到了

translation.en: but, when it comes right down to it,
translation.zh: ‎但回归根本

translation.en: it's still, basically, a hand in a head.
translation.zh:
‎布偶依然是
‎要把手伸进头里操控的东西

translation.en: [Brian] You know, when I do it, it's just a drawing. It's a few scribbles.
translation.zh: ‎我会先把人物画出来 ‎通常只是几个素描

translation.en: They've got to sculpt it, and it's in clay.
translation.zh: ‎接着用粘土把它们雕塑出来

translation.en: And it's a dead thing,
translation.zh: ‎雕塑是没有生命的

translation.en: and you've got to make sure that somehow that has life.
translation.zh: ‎因此我们必须赋予它生命

translation.en: Then it's made into a mold, which is a dead... you know, a dead thing,
translation.zh:
‎之后根据雕塑做成模具
‎模具也是死物

translation.en: and then it's cast into this strange thing that is rubber...
translation.zh: ‎然后再浇铸某种奇怪的塑胶

translation.en: that has its own life but has nothing to do with what you're doing.
translation.zh:
‎有了某种生命力
‎但依然和你的目标差很远

translation.en: And then you've got somebody who's gonna make mechanics in it
translation.zh: ‎接着要找个人植入机械

translation.en: that are just solid and only do a few things,
translation.zh: ‎这个机械小而坚实 只有几个功能

translation.en: and you've got to try and get those things together.
translation.zh: ‎然后把机器和布偶融为一体

translation.en: And it's got to now express some life,
translation.zh: ‎如今布偶就开始生动起来了

translation.en: and then you give it to the puppeteer.
translation.zh: ‎最后才交给布偶师

translation.en: [Peter] It's another challenge for a show like this,
translation.zh: ‎制作这种剧集还有一项挑战

translation.en: is that we're creating the actors for the show.
translation.zh: ‎那就是为剧集创造出演员

translation.en: They're not gags, they're not seen only from the left side, or the right side, or...
translation.zh:
‎这不是在演布偶小剧场
‎观众不会只看到人物的某一侧

translation.en: You know, [stammers] they don't just show up for five minutes. This is the cast.
translation.zh:
‎不会只出场五分钟
‎这是在扮演一个角色

translation.en: -[man] Ready? -Clap test.
translation.zh: ‎掌力测试

translation.en: [Neil] I don't think puppeteers are well-known
translation.zh: ‎布偶师不是名人

translation.en: by nature of their job, that they are hidden.
translation.zh: ‎他们的工作性质是不能露面

translation.en: Uh, and I don't think...
translation.zh: ‎我不认为…

translation.en: there's very few famous puppeteers.
translation.zh: ‎有名气的布偶师不多

translation.en: It is an art where you choose to hide.
translation.zh: ‎选择这门手艺意味着要藏起来

translation.en: And I very much I think it's like a musician,
translation.zh:
‎从很多方面来看
‎布偶师比较接近乐手

translation.en: that you have an instrument, but you play a beautiful tune on it.
translation.zh: ‎手上掌握着一个乐器 ‎弹奏出美妙的乐曲

translation.en: But we all listen to the... we all listen to tune.
translation.zh: ‎观众把乐曲听进耳里

translation.en: It's the tune we remember.
translation.zh: ‎我们会记得乐曲

translation.en: It's not necessarily the piano it was played on.
translation.zh: ‎但不一定记得奏出乐曲的钢琴

translation.en: It's the-- the character that-- that lives
translation.zh: ‎就如我们记得那个人物

translation.en: and has its own life.
translation.zh: ‎因为它有了生命

translation.en: [Olly] People were telling stories with puppetry
translation.zh: ‎在演员这个职业出现以前

translation.en: long before they decided to come up and act,
translation.zh: ‎人们都通过布偶来说故事

translation.en: because they were too frightened to act,
translation.zh: ‎因为以前的人害怕站出来演戏

translation.en: because they were trying to represent all the ancient gods
translation.zh: ‎毕竟他们要扮演古代神明

translation.en: and all the myths.
translation.zh: ‎演出神话故事

translation.en: We're just bringing back with the current technologies
translation.zh:
‎我们只是在通过现代科技
‎来复活这一传统

translation.en: and sort of mythology that we've got this desire to explore these different story lines,
translation.zh: ‎我们渴望探索的各种幻想故事情节

translation.en: but we're just being able to do it through Netflix and through... [chuckling] animatronics.
translation.zh:
‎Netflix和机械技术
‎让我们实现了这个梦想

translation.en: As a child, I endlessly drew Jim Henson content and Star Wars content.
translation.zh:
‎我小时候经常临摹

translation.en: Drawings. I used to write stuff and model stuff in plasticine.
translation.zh: ‎边画边写 ‎有时会用橡皮泥做模型

translation.zh: ‎我对这两门艺术非常着迷

translation.zh: ‎一路走来非常幸运

translation.en: Three, two, one...
translation.zh: ‎三、二、一

translation.zh: ‎两岁那年 ‎第一次通过电视看布偶戏时

translation.en: and I was like, "I need to do that."
translation.zh: ‎我就告诉自己：“我要当布偶师”

translation.en: Straightaway, "That's what I want to do for life."
translation.zh: ‎马上就知道：“这是我这一生的志愿”

translation.en: And I did it from that point on.
translation.zh: ‎也从那一刻开始接触布偶

translation.en: My dad gave me a book when I was growing up,
translation.zh: ‎我小时候爸爸给我一本书

translation.en: and this book was Fairies,
translation.zh: ‎书里有许多仙女

translation.en: and it was illustrated by Brian Froud.
translation.zh: ‎画家是布莱恩弗劳德

translation.en: [Neil] All the work that I've ever seen Hensons do
translation.zh: ‎汉森以前所做过的事

translation.en: is, in form, what I do now,
translation.zh: ‎跟我目前所做的事

translation.en: and, strangely full circle, here I am
translation.zh:
‎意外地凑成一个圆 ‎我目前所做的事
‎跟当初启发我的事是一样的

translation.en: doing what inspired me in the beginning.
translation.zh:
‎我目前所做的事
‎跟当初启发我的事是一样的

translation.en: [Simon] The point is with puppetry is that it's a medium,
translation.zh: ‎布偶是个媒介体

translation.en: it's an art form in itself, and that's what you're watching.
translation.zh: ‎本身也是个艺术形态 ‎观众看的就是布偶艺术

translation.en: It helps you to stay slightly detached and think about it a bit more.
translation.zh: ‎因此可以稍微拉开距离 ‎赋予更多思考空间

translation.en: You don't just get hypnotized by looking through a window, you know?
translation.zh: ‎而不是紧盯着屏幕入神

translation.en: You're looking at something which is a... a representation.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我们欣赏的是某种形式的表演

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎含蓄

translation.zh: ‎这属于…

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这些都是没有灵魂的物体

translation.zh: ‎或是表现出一副被吓着的样子

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎做出不同角色应有的表情

translation.zh: ‎她被吓着了 她在沉思

translation.zh: ‎在眼神由另一个人操控的情况下

translation.zh: ‎这是悲伤时的表现 布偶闭上眼睛

translation.zh: ‎当它抬头时

translation.zh:
‎对方必须看准你抬头的时机

translation.zh:
‎或是它提早睁开眼睛

translation.zh:
‎但因为操控布偶的人是我

translation.zh: ‎时机也到位

translation.zh: ‎布偶师习惯这样操控布偶

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我在操纵它时

translation.zh: ‎我认为这看起来不自然

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我则负责稳住它的身体

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎却让观众相信它们是活的

translation.zh: ‎例如它稍微偏头

translation.zh: ‎观众就可以看懂它的情绪

translation.zh: ‎例如它往下看 观众就知道它难过

translation.zh: ‎在摄影、灯光和站位的辅助下

translation.zh: ‎布偶可以做出任何情绪表现

translation.zh: ‎非常不容易和费劲 操作务必精准

translation.zh: ‎哪天我们只需负责

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这是怪兽的肚子

translation.zh: ‎为了进入潜意识

translation.en: to get rid of the chattering mind,
translation.zh: ‎排除吵杂声

translation.en: I'll just scribble.
translation.zh: ‎我就直接乱涂

translation.en: And it's... and it's like looking at nature
translation.zh: ‎就像望着大自然

translation.en: and trying to see a face in the... in the.. in the bark of a tree.
translation.zh: ‎设法从树干上找到一张脸孔

translation.en: Somewhere in here, I've got to find...
translation.zh: ‎我必须设法从这块空白中

translation.en: what... what that is.
translation.zh: ‎找到某种东西

translation.en: The challenge is...
translation.zh: ‎难处在于…

translation.en: it's got to be different, but it's got to be meaningful.
translation.zh: ‎既要不同 也要有意义

translation.en: How do you find meaning in a line?
translation.zh: ‎要怎么从线条中找到意义？

translation.en: [Toby] To be able to see that stuff come out, and see those things work,
translation.zh: ‎能见证从零到有 ‎看到一切走入正轨

translation.en: and characters come alive once again...
translation.zh: ‎所有角色再次活过来

translation.en: or to be able to talk to him and find out, you know, about things from the original,
translation.zh: ‎或是有机会跟他交流 ‎了解原版电影的点点滴滴

translation.en: on how he interprets something or sees something.
translation.zh: ‎以及他如何诠释或理解某个部分

translation.en: I mean, that's the magic.
translation.zh: ‎就够不可思议了

translation.en: [Jeff] I think it's amazing that the whole Froud family has kind of come back. Like...
translation.zh:
‎看到弗劳德一家再次走进大家的视野
‎感觉太美妙了

translation.en: to see the three of them working together is incredible.
translation.zh:
‎看到他们三个人一起工作的画面
‎我感到不可思议

translation.en: And to see him...
translation.zh: ‎看到他…

translation.en: watch his son... follow in sort of the family business.
translation.zh: ‎望着儿子传承这个家族企业…

translation.en: But it's not even the family business, it's like the family world.
translation.zh: ‎这也不是家族企业 ‎而是一个家族环境

translation.en: [Toby] That's where I think we're sort of thriving in this fact
translation.zh: ‎我想这就是我们成功的因素

translation.en: is the fact that we're...
translation.zh: ‎毕竟…

translation.en: you know, we're in this world that's so natural to us as a family
translation.zh: ‎这是我们一家人习以为常的世界

translation.en: that we're able to... to just impart what we know, or what we actually just know to be real.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们才得以
‎把知识和真实感传承下去

translation.en: As I grew older, I found that I had the Froudian style, as we call it,
translation.zh:
‎随着年龄增长
‎我发现自己也有弗劳德家的遗传

translation.en: um, where it felt comfortable and it felt like home.
translation.zh:
‎做起道具来得心应手
‎就像待在家一样

translation.en: [Taron] I went into the creature workshop, and it's still the Frouds who are creating
translation.zh: ‎我走进道具工作室 ‎发现这些不可思议的外星生物

translation.en: these wonderful other-worldly creations,
translation.zh: ‎依然出自弗劳德家之手

translation.en: and here's Brian Frouds' son who is doing a lot of the work in there.
translation.zh: ‎看到布莱恩弗劳德的儿子 ‎在工作室里忙碌

translation.en: And I was like a fanboy meeting him, because he's the baby from Labyrinth.
translation.zh: ‎我就成了一个小粉丝 ‎他就是《魔幻迷宫》里的那个宝宝

translation.en: So then, the duality of not only seeing someone
translation.zh: ‎等于是一举两得 我看见一个

translation.en: from a film that I loved as a child,
translation.zh: ‎出现在我儿时热爱的电影中的人

translation.en: but then also seeing his creative prowess and this incredible work he's doing.
translation.zh: ‎还能见识到他高超的创作能力 ‎以及他所打造的作品

translation.en: It was just fantastic to go and get a glimpse of all that.
translation.zh: ‎能见着这一切 感觉太不可思议了

translation.en: [Peter] You have to take something that's spiritual, and creative, and beautiful to look at, i.e. Brian's designs,
translation.zh:
‎我们要使用灵魂
‎创意和美感去欣赏布莱恩的作品

translation.en: and then somehow translate them and actually create a puppet that works.
translation.zh: ‎然后把它们转化成有生命力的布偶

translation.en: A sculpture that is gonna work technically, mechanically for the puppeteer,
translation.zh:
‎打造出一个无论在技术层面
‎机械层面都符合布偶师需求的塑像

translation.en: as well as visually look correct,
translation.zh: ‎在视觉层面也不能有差池

translation.en: and-- and capture the spirit that was in Brian's drawings.
translation.zh: ‎才能体现出布莱恩为素描赋予的灵魂

translation.en: Generally, we get one of two versions of designs when we have designers.
translation.zh:
‎大致上
‎设计师会发来两种不同的造型设计

translation.en: It's either a maquettes, maquettes are the small sculptures,
translation.zh:
‎我们收到可能是小模型
‎小模型是指小型雕像

translation.en: and Toby Froud was providing those.
translation.zh: ‎这些都出自托比弗劳德之手

translation.en: And those are very helpful because you get a three dimensional view
translation.zh: ‎这些小模型非常有帮助 ‎让我们可以观察到作品的立体面向

translation.en: of what you're creating.
translation.zh: ‎让我们可以观察到作品的立体面向

translation.en: And Brian Froud was sending sketches,
translation.zh: ‎而布莱恩弗劳德发来的是素描

translation.en: and he's got a very loose style.
translation.zh: ‎他的画风非常懒散

translation.en: So, luckily for us, Toby Froud is with us,
translation.zh: ‎幸好有托比弗劳德在

translation.en: and he's known his father his whole life.
translation.zh: ‎他这辈子都在跟父亲处在一起

translation.en: Imagine! So, he could interpret what the squiggles meant.
translation.zh:
‎想象一下
‎所以他才知道怎么诠释这些线条

translation.en: [Brian] What they were doing is very, um, kindly
translation.zh: ‎他们非常贴心

translation.en: trying to tidy my drawings up.
translation.zh: ‎试着梳理我的素描

translation.en: They were trying to, um, even everything up.
translation.zh: ‎确保不会有任何差池

translation.en: And once they understood it's meant to be asymmetrical,
translation.zh:
‎当他们理解到某些不对称的部分
‎是刻意设计的

translation.en: it's meant to be growing, and organic, and have a flow to it,
translation.zh: ‎某些部分需要成长、是活的 ‎有自己的律动感

translation.en: it just became simple and it just...
translation.zh: ‎一切就变得简单易明了

translation.en: -everything fell into place from then on. -[man] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎从那一刻起 一切水到渠成

translation.en: Sometimes we weren't understanding exactly the direction design-wise.
translation.zh:
‎有时我们并不理解
‎造型设计的明确方向

translation.en: We weren't hitting it.
translation.zh: ‎行不通

translation.en: And then, he said, "That's it.
translation.zh: ‎他就会说 ‎“没错 就往另一个方向”

translation.en: What I want is other."
translation.zh: ‎“没错 就往另一个方向”

translation.en: [Toby] And again, it's that journey.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟这是一个旅程

translation.en: It's just believing and trusting,
translation.zh: ‎只要信任 只要相信

translation.en: and as soon as it happens, you will get on,
translation.zh: ‎时机一到 马上抓紧

translation.en: and then it just moves.
translation.zh: ‎一切就迎刃而解了

translation.en: [Gavin] The process of designing something like this does start
translation.zh: ‎设计这些人物的第一步 ‎当然是参考原版电影

translation.en: with looking back at the old film, obviously.
translation.zh: ‎当然是参考原版电影

translation.en: That's what you're trying to reproduce, that spirit, and push it further.
translation.zh:
‎我们要再次塑造出同样的灵魂
‎还要比以前更好

translation.en: Obviously, Brian Froud was... was very much with Jim Henson,
translation.zh: ‎对于原版电影的造型设计

translation.en: the architect of that early product.
translation.zh:
‎布莱恩弗劳德和吉姆汉森的想法
‎非常接近

translation.en: And Brian is still around. You know, he's been quite involved.
translation.zh: ‎如今布莱恩依然健在 ‎也热衷参与制作过程

translation.en: We were all a bit nervous at the beginning of obviously, meeting him and talking to him,
translation.zh:
‎起初大家见到他
‎跟他沟通时都有点紧张

translation.en: knowing that we were sort of holding his baby.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我们手上掌握着他的作品

translation.en: [Brian] Jim really was intrigued by ley lines,
translation.zh: ‎吉姆非常喜欢灵脉的纹路

translation.en: and then there is a sacred geometry.
translation.zh: ‎也喜欢神秘几何图腾

translation.en: And what it did was give the original film a depth.
translation.zh: ‎这些元素为原版电影增添了深度

translation.en: [Blanca] We made sure that both in the script
translation.zh: ‎我们确保 ‎剧本和艺术部门

translation.en: but also in the art department production
translation.zh: ‎剧本和艺术部门

translation.en: that all those symbols and all that language,
translation.zh: ‎融入这些符号和语言

translation.en: that it had layers,
translation.zh: ‎从而展现层次感

translation.en: and that it had, therefore, life.
translation.zh: ‎然后赋予人物生命

translation.en: Brian has done some wonderful, uh, drawings on the Skeksis.
translation.zh:
‎布莱恩为史基斯人
‎画了一些漂亮的素描

translation.en: And you'll see little kind of bug-like creatures,
translation.zh: ‎于是我们看到了一个类似昆虫的生物

translation.en: you know, on these circles, and triangles, and everything.
translation.zh: ‎被圆形和三角形的符号围绕着

translation.en: And I took those, and from them I sketched
translation.zh: ‎我把这些符号取来重画

translation.en: about... well in the end, we ended up with about 54 symbols.
translation.zh: ‎最后总共拟出54个符号

translation.en: from which we said, "Okay, this is our Skeksis alphabet."
translation.zh:
‎我们看了说：
‎“这就是史基斯人的字母表”

translation.en: And so... we eventually...
translation.zh: ‎这些符号都记载在这本宝典里

translation.en: made it to here, which is the--
translation.zh: ‎这些符号都记载在这本宝典里 ‎也就是…

translation.en: This is the aggression symbol, which is the big Skeksis symbol.
translation.zh: ‎这是主要符号 ‎象征着史基斯人

translation.en: And then it... it opens...
translation.zh: ‎打开来看

translation.en: It's a very aggressive... object.
translation.zh: ‎里面都是非常刺激的图文

translation.en: So, you try and... you try and read...
translation.zh: ‎逐页翻阅

translation.en: some of this, and then it...
translation.zh: ‎可以看到这一页 然后…

translation.en: then it just springs open.
translation.zh: ‎还可以打开来

translation.en: To put together a fantasy universe on paper... is a lot of work,
translation.zh: ‎将一个幻想世界具体化需要很多心力

translation.en: but then, to do the details of the fantasy world... practically...
translation.zh:
‎但要把幻想世界做到细致入微
‎严格来说…

translation.en: First of all it's fun, but it's a lot of work.
translation.zh: ‎虽然好玩 但非常耗力

translation.en: So, the artistry of it's huge.
translation.zh: ‎因此整个艺术作业非常庞大

translation.en: [Jason] First, I came in and met Louis,
translation.zh: ‎我来找路易时 一走进片场

translation.en: and I looked at the screen and they ran a bit,
translation.zh: ‎他们用显示屏放了一个片段

translation.en: and I was taken aback. I was just side-swiped by the scale and majesty of it.
translation.zh:
‎我整个人惊呆了
‎我被片场规模之大深深地震撼了

translation.en: How it looked like a gigantic Hollywood special effects movie.
translation.zh:
‎看起来就像在拍摄一部
‎好莱坞大型特效电影

translation.en: I hadn't expected, I guess, that level of effort and artistry.
translation.zh:
‎我没想到要投注
‎这么庞大的心力和艺术作业

translation.en: I had no idea of the, uh... the kind of epic nature of the show.
translation.zh:
‎我起初并没有想到
‎这部剧集的规模有多强大

translation.en: [Louis] More rocks would create a little bit of a...
translation.zh: ‎用石头在斜道上做一扇门

translation.en: -you know, a gate for the ramp. -[Gavin] No, that will work well.
translation.zh: ‎用石头在斜道上做一扇门 ‎那就行得通了

translation.en: [Erik] I just feel like it's such a luxury
translation.zh: ‎有机会在这个世界中拍摄

translation.en: to be allowed to shoot in this world
translation.zh: ‎是一种奢侈

translation.en: that's not only so rich and full of details,
translation.zh: ‎片场处处都是细节

translation.en: but that is, of course, just handmade from scratch for this.
translation.zh: ‎而且都是从零开始手工打造的

translation.en: [Simon] Often when you watch a film or a special effects movie, you'd say, "How do they do that?"
translation.zh:
‎每次观赏特效电影时
‎我们会问：“他们是怎么办到的？”

translation.en: With this, you know how they do it, it's just incredible how they do it.
translation.zh: ‎有了场景 就知道是怎么办到了 ‎只是他们也太厉害了

translation.en: They had about 30 to 35 sets on Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: ‎以前摄制组打造了30到35个布景

translation.en: and they had about three years prep.
translation.zh: ‎前前后后耗了三年

translation.en: We have about 70, 80 sets,
translation.zh: ‎我们要打造70到80个布景

translation.en: and we had about six months prep.
translation.zh: ‎只有六个月的时间筹备

translation.en: So, your first, other than creative, thought is about a schedule.
translation.zh:
‎除了创意以外
‎我们还要赶得上竣工日

translation.en: Is about how do we work this?
translation.zh: ‎要怎么交差？

translation.en: We were prepping this from when we started pre-production,
translation.zh: ‎我们从前制期就开始筹备布景了

translation.en: making the trees, the plants, the vines that are hanging up.
translation.zh:
‎先做树和植物
‎以及到挂在树上的藤蔓

translation.en: And then, there's all the prop-made plants that we based most of them from the original movie.
translation.zh:
‎这些植物道具的造型
‎都是取自原版电影

translation.en: We got all the old photos and reference of all those crazy little plants that were in Dark Crystal.
translation.zh:
‎我们参考了旧版《黑水晶》里
‎所有奇葩植物的旧照和图鉴

translation.en: [Ty] Every piece that you see in here,
translation.zh: ‎我们所看到每个布景

translation.en: we've actually copied from the original film.
translation.zh: ‎都是取自原版电影

translation.en: We actually got the original drawings.
translation.zh: ‎我们把原图弄来了

translation.en: The original drawings, yeah, original photographs,
translation.zh: ‎我们把原图和原照弄来了

translation.en: even the original concept models of the original sculpts.
translation.zh: ‎就连原版模型和雕像也一并弄来

translation.en: Richard and Ty jumped into the Froud sensibility very... like, they went in feet first.
translation.zh:
‎里查德和老泰
‎很快就跟弗劳德达到感性共识

translation.en: I mean, that... there's an original Skeksis sword
translation.zh: ‎这是原版史基斯人的剑

translation.en: when this is actually copied from the original one.
translation.zh: ‎取自原版电影

translation.en: I mean, they're beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎太美了

translation.en: It's obviously Brian Froud who designed those.
translation.zh: ‎显然出自布莱恩弗劳德笔下

translation.en: [Taron] There's a real joy in knowing that every detail has been... completely, lovingly crafted,
translation.zh: ‎得知每个细节都是经过精心打造

translation.en: and there's something akin to a great painting.
translation.zh:
‎好比如勾勒一副伟大画作
‎感觉令人心旷神怡

translation.en: There's something wonderful about knowing you can pause any frame
translation.zh:
‎无论定格在哪一帧
‎每一刻都经过精心设计

translation.en: and know that no moment in there is an accident.
translation.zh: ‎这是令人欢欣鼓舞的事

translation.en: Every leaf you see has been placed there.
translation.zh: ‎每一片叶子都是用人手别上去的

translation.en: Every movement of the character has been considered.
translation.zh: ‎每个人物动作都是经过考量

translation.en: To invest in creating an entire other world,
translation.zh: ‎将心力投注在创造一个架空世界

translation.en: down to the smallest details of what its flowers look like, and its food stuffs,
translation.zh:
‎不放过每个微妙细节
‎从花和食物的造型

translation.en: to the constellation of the planetary alignments of the cosmos that it holds,
translation.zh:
‎到整个宇宙的星宿排序
‎每个细节都考量在内

translation.en: you are transported to an entirely different landscape
translation.zh: ‎这等于来到另一个截然不同的世界

translation.en: which overwhelms you.
translation.zh: ‎令人感到震撼

translation.en: [Will] I turned to Jeff at one point and said,
translation.zh: ‎有一回我望着杰夫说

translation.en: "Boy, we'd better be careful what we write."
translation.zh: ‎“小子 我们写剧本要小心”

translation.en: Because, you know, we just put, like, uh, "exterior, balcony,"
translation.zh:
‎毕竟如果我们写出类似
‎“露台外景”的布景设置

translation.en: and then we get into, "What are they talking about on the balcony?
translation.zh: ‎然后开始写剧情 ‎“他们在阳台聊什么？

translation.en: What's the plot? What's the story? What are the characters on the balcony?"
translation.zh:
‎剧情是什么？
‎哪些人物出现在露台？”

translation.en: And then you look, and this balcony wraps around,
translation.zh:
‎之后我们就会看到片场
‎出现一座巍然蜿蜒的露台

translation.en: and it's 300 feet long,
translation.zh: ‎大概90米长

translation.en: and you're just, like, "Who thought of that? It's beautiful."
translation.zh:
‎我们看了直问：
‎“是谁想出来的？太美了”

translation.en: [Gavin] One of the big ones was the citadel, the throne room, for the Ha'rar Gelfling Clan,
translation.zh:
‎另一个大型布景是
‎首都哈拉的葛弗林族王座室

translation.en: and completely new world, very important, it's the head clan.
translation.zh:
‎那是个截然不同的重大布景
‎因为是七大氏族之首的王座室

translation.en: We went through quite a few different incarnations of what that needs to be,
translation.zh: ‎我们看了好几个不同的诠释

translation.en: trying to hold within the budget,
translation.zh: ‎努力不让成本超出预算

translation.en: because anything with a compound curve that isn't a straight line
translation.zh:
‎因为凡是有复合曲线的设计
‎只要不是直线

translation.en: is more expensive than something with a straight line.
translation.zh: ‎价格都会比较高

translation.en: [Phil] We had Machu Picchu, which was our inspiration for this.
translation.zh: ‎我们的设计灵感取自马丘比丘古迹

translation.en: This was a town that was up in the heavens.
translation.zh: ‎这个耸立在云端的城市

translation.en: Well, it was fantastic to see those environments practically,
translation.zh: ‎看见这些实际布景不被镜头框架局限

translation.en: um, not framed for the camera,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得不可思议

translation.en: because you could see the mechanics of it.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以看见整个操作情形

translation.en: The fact that they had to be built so high so that the puppets could go inside.
translation.zh: ‎工作人员必须把布景建在高处 ‎这样才能把布偶放进去

translation.en: So our standard height here, we have four-foot-high rostrums.
translation.zh: ‎标准高度有了 平台有1米高

translation.en: There's the finished set floor and then the set sits on top,
translation.zh: ‎工作人员把布景建在平台上

translation.en: and that's so we can open up the floor to drop the puppeteers in
translation.zh: ‎平台可以打开 然后把布偶伸出去

translation.en: to have the creatures at the right height.
translation.zh: ‎确保它们高度正确

translation.en: That doesn't happen on a normal show.
translation.zh: ‎平常拍摄剧集没有这种情形

translation.en: So, you've got the creature's complexity, you've got the complexity of the set,
translation.zh: ‎我们要处理片中生物的造型复杂性 ‎也要注意片场的复杂性

translation.en: so you have to map out in great detail which creature's gonna move where
translation.zh: ‎我们先要拟出细节 ‎搞清楚片中生物的移动方向

translation.en: to provide the right type of flooring or open up the flooring.
translation.zh:
‎使用适合的地板材质
‎或是确定要打开哪一块地板

translation.en: [Richard] On another film where you're not making everything,
translation.zh: ‎拍摄其他影集时不必什么都动手做

translation.en: I'll-- I'll run around and find everything,
translation.zh: ‎我会到处去找需要的道具

translation.en: book it from the rental companies or buy it, and then...
translation.zh:
‎要不向道具租借公司订做
‎要不去买 然后…

translation.en: But with this, on a daily basis, we're constantly making pieces.
translation.zh:
‎但这部剧集不同
‎我们天天都在制做道具

translation.en: [Gavin] And not just at human scale.
translation.zh: ‎这种工作量不是一般人办得到的

translation.en: There's nothing that could be really hired or purchased.

translation.zh: ‎在我看来

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎配音是个有趣的过程

translation.zh: ‎也是个正面的挑战

translation.zh: ‎假设是为动画片配音 演员先配音

translation.zh: ‎然后动画师会按照声音来绘制动画

translation.zh: ‎我们必须配合布偶师表演

translation.zh: ‎这些人既是出色的布偶师

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这是个有趣的约束 毕竟这些布偶师

translation.zh: ‎尽是世界顶级的布偶师

translation.en: have done the work already
translation.zh: ‎他们已经表演完毕

translation.en: and so, you have to act and convey truth, power, fear, threat, whatever it is,
translation.zh:
‎而我们则必须将人物的真挚

translation.en: but you have to match the discipline.
translation.zh: ‎但又不能脱离设定

translation.zh: ‎赶紧前往水晶室

translation.zh: ‎要用上很多时间才做对

translation.zh: ‎能做到贴合嘴形已经够满意了

translation.zh: ‎但必须确保台词的节奏一致

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎首先是…

translation.zh: ‎虽然不容易

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎毕竟这是触手可及的实体物

translation.zh: ‎我们保护水晶之主

translation.zh: ‎水晶之主保护真相水晶

translation.zh: ‎单看配音阵容就足以说明一切

translation.zh:

translation.en: and, um, it's a team eff-- like, it's genuinely a team effort.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个名副其实的团队作业

translation.zh:

translation.zh:
‎观众可以通过作品感受到
‎这种兼收并蓄的世界

translation.zh: ‎这是水晶出现的那一刻 ‎（配乐师 丹尼尔彭博顿）

translation.zh: ‎水晶下来时 我们会听到这个声音

translation.zh: ‎这是配合水晶登场的配乐

translation.en: And there's an instability to sound.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以听到声音的不稳定性

translation.en: This is kind of connected to the crystal and the, uh, Skeksis.
translation.zh: ‎主要配合水晶和史基斯人登场

translation.en: In a way, it's a very uncomfortable sound.
translation.zh: ‎可以说是听起来很不舒服的声音

translation.zh: ‎再来是这个声音

translation.en: a sound you wouldn't associate with an orchestra.
translation.zh:
‎这是一种不会令人联想到
‎交响乐的声音

translation.en: It's just a very unusual sound.
translation.zh: ‎总之是非常不寻常的音乐

translation.en: [Daniel] The Dark Crystal world always felt, to me, like from a different time.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉《黑水晶》里的世界
‎像是存在于另一个时空

translation.en: I sort of felt, musically, I wanted to incorporate as many different elements from all types of musical culture into the score.
translation.zh:
‎因此我希望在配乐中
‎融入许多不同音乐文化的元素

translation.en: I also wanted to give it a simplicity in way,
translation.zh: ‎也希望能使用简练的配乐来营造气氛

translation.en: because a lot of early instruments, they often--
translation.zh: ‎因为许多早期的乐器

translation.en: they might not even have a chromatic scale,
translation.zh: ‎根本没有所谓的半音音阶

translation.en: they might have quite a simple scale on them.
translation.zh: ‎可能只有一个简单的音阶

translation.en: And by limiting yourself to more of just a smaller range of notes,
translation.zh: ‎在限制使用更多音符的情况下

translation.en: it starts to feel, hopefully, more authentic.
translation.zh: ‎希望能带出更真实的感觉

translation.en: I want it to feel like this music could have been made in Thra.
translation.zh: ‎我要让人觉得这种音乐源自于瑟拉

translation.en: Cast him out.
translation.zh: ‎他们会把他赶出去

translation.en: How can they not?
translation.zh: ‎怎么不会呢？

translation.en: To believe him is not to believe themselves.
translation.zh: ‎相信他就等于怀疑自己

translation.en: [Daniel] And so, the idea with that is we can use it in lots of different ways through the show.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以用这种形式

translation.en: [Skeksis] Thra belongs to us now.
translation.zh: ‎瑟拉已经属于我们了

translation.zh: ‎葛弗林人无能为力

translation.zh: ‎第一次去参观片场时 ‎我们看到了许多不可思议的道具

translation.zh: ‎我们看到了许多不可思议的道具

translation.zh: ‎心想：“天啊 太真实了”

translation.zh:
‎我认为在这个作品中
‎“真实”是个关键词

translation.en: If the music can feel as tactile as everything else,
translation.zh: ‎如果配乐也能跟那个世界一样真实

translation.en: then we've sort of succeeded.
translation.zh: ‎就算成功了

translation.en: [Daniel] I think everyone involved in this show
translation.zh: ‎我认为每个参与这部剧集的人

translation.en: has put so much work and effort
translation.zh: ‎都在每个细节上

translation.en: into every minute detail.
translation.zh: ‎投入了许多心力

translation.en: I think every department,
translation.zh: ‎我认为每个部门

translation.en: from, you know, sound, to costume design,
translation.zh: ‎从音乐部门到戏服设计部门

translation.en: to story, to set building, the puppeteers,
translation.zh: ‎从编剧、建造布景到操作布偶

translation.en: everyone is putting something
translation.zh: ‎每个人都投入了心力

translation.en: that most of us wouldn't even know what-- what is going into it.
translation.zh: ‎多数人都不知道成果如何

translation.en: And that's what makes the show so special, I think, because...
translation.zh: ‎这就是这部剧集如此特别的原因 ‎毕竟在创意方面 这是前所未见的

translation.en: it's creatively like... unlike anything else you've seen.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟在创意方面 这是前所未见的

translation.en: [Jason] Nobody's making films with puppets anymore,
translation.zh: ‎如今已经没有人拍摄布偶戏了

translation.en: the world's greatest puppeteers.
translation.zh: ‎这些人都是世界顶级布偶师

translation.en: They're working at the very top of their game.
translation.zh: ‎这是他们职涯中最耀眼的成就

translation.en: They're working in a context where one of the greatest DPs in the world
translation.zh: ‎他们跟世界顶尖摄影指导合作 ‎他为这个作品打灯和拍摄

translation.zh: ‎他为这个作品打灯和拍摄

translation.en: And so, uh, it's a look that you've never seen before.
translation.zh: ‎这是前所未见的情景

translation.en: It's a look I've never seen before, that's for sure.
translation.zh: ‎我肯定没见过这种情景

translation.en: Go where I can see you. I'll be on the other side.
translation.zh:
‎不要走到我看不到你的地方
‎我会在另一边

translation.en: [Taron] Film-making of all types is deceptively simple. That's the thing about it, you know, it's an illusion
translation.zh: ‎摄制作业看似简单 那是错觉

translation.en: and that's the great joy of it, you know,
translation.zh: ‎但这种辛苦能换来大大的幸福

translation.zh: ‎因为有一群人 ‎带着热忱 辛勤地工作

translation.en: to create something that other people enjoy in a fraction of the time it took to create.
translation.zh: ‎在短时间内创造出观众喜欢的作品

translation.zh: ‎路易太棒了 ‎他…

translation.zh:
‎我不知道他怎么办到的

translation.en: I really love the fact that he embraced our methodology so wholeheartedly.
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴
‎他全心全意地接受我们的做法

translation.en: I felt he was always, you know, behind us. He was championing what we were doing.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉他一直在支持我们 ‎甚至在我们之上

translation.en: Swings in, that makes it ring.
translation.zh: ‎挥剑 让它响起来

translation.en: [Olly] Absolutely every day is a voyage of discovery on this job.
translation.zh: ‎工作期间 每天都是一个探索之旅

translation.en: We anticipate, analyze, and plan as best we can,
translation.zh: ‎我们仔细评估、分析和策划

translation.zh: ‎但这是一部大制作

translation.zh: ‎摄制组雄心壮志

translation.zh: ‎不能做得面面俱到

translation.zh: ‎因此一到片场 就会出现更动

translation.zh: ‎例如改变拍摄角度 ‎发现不太对劲后

translation.zh:
‎我们总能找到更理想

translation.en: Sometimes we don't.
translation.zh: ‎有时碰壁

translation.en: Sometimes things don't work as we planned,
translation.zh: ‎有时事情不如我们所愿

translation.en: and then we have to completely change direction.
translation.zh: ‎到时必须彻底改变方向

translation.en: We're constantly altering, and changing, and addressing everything.
translation.zh: ‎我们不断地修改和定义一切

translation.zh: ‎我们更换皮肤材质、修改口腔构造

translation.en: We're working on hand paddles,
translation.zh: ‎我们设计手套

translation.en: we're trying to always make things better,
translation.zh: ‎我们都在努力让作品变得更好

translation.en: and also make sure that things
translation.zh: ‎确保所有即将出场的道具

translation.en: function for whatever they need to do next.
translation.zh: ‎能顺利操作

translation.en: [Ritamarie] The beauty of it is it looks simple.
translation.zh: ‎令人着迷的是 这些作业看似简单

translation.en: At the end of the day, nobody's gonna understand
translation.zh: ‎但成品出来后 没有人想得到

translation.en: what it took to try to get there.
translation.zh: ‎他们是怎么办到的

translation.en: If you'd have said, "Let's shoot puppets hand-held
translation.zh:
‎假设有人建议：
‎“用一台手持和一台斯坦尼康

translation.zh: ‎两部摄影机同时拍摄布偶戏”

translation.zh: ‎我会认为这个人是疯子 ‎这违反直觉

translation.zh: ‎我们要把布偶师的头藏起来 ‎也要把袖子藏起来

translation.en: and as soon as you have a wobbly frame, then you're just gonna kill yourself.
translation.zh: ‎如果镜头稍微摇晃 ‎就会恨不得杀死自己

translation.en: But, you know, he does it, and he does it amazingly,
translation.zh: ‎但他办到了 效果非常好

translation.en: and I think it will change the way people perhaps shoot puppets in the future.
translation.zh: ‎这将改变人们日后拍摄布偶戏的方法

translation.zh: ‎路易把稳定器系在身上

translation.en: He's moving on the fly, he's constantly adjusting,
translation.zh: ‎健步如飞 不断调整

translation.zh:
‎“有个头出现了

translation.en: And so, it's much more sort of fluid,
translation.zh: ‎确保画面更流畅

translation.zh:
‎所以布偶师需要…
‎我相信他们都不曾有过

translation.en: had ever worked with having two cameras running,
translation.zh:
‎配合两台摄影机演出的经验

translation.zh:
‎配合两台摄影机演出的经验
‎也就是同时有两个监视器 ‎布偶很容易影响视线

translation.en: [Neil] We're used to quite static stuff on us.
translation.zh: ‎我们非常习惯静态之物

translation.en: And we kind of work within a frame that we're given,
translation.zh: ‎我们有个固定的活动范围

translation.en: whereas Louis and Erik, they're giving us so much movement.
translation.zh: ‎路易和艾瑞克给了我们更多活动空间

translation.en: And we know Louis has got a much bigger picture in his head than we have.
translation.zh:
‎我们也知道路易脑海中的画面
‎比我们想象中大

translation.en: You watch the show and you forget you're watching puppets.
translation.zh:
‎观赏这部剧集时
‎你们会忘了这是一部布偶秀

translation.en: And if we do this, if we achieve that,
translation.zh: ‎如果办到这点

translation.en: we might be onto something.
translation.zh: ‎就算成功了

translation.zh: ‎虽然不算成功 ‎但我们天天都在努力

translation.en: [Natalie] It's a marathon task.
translation.zh: ‎这好比如一场马拉松

translation.en: It's to have the mental capacity to play that three dimensional chess
translation.zh: ‎要用脑力去从事这种难度很高的任务

translation.en: of being, thinking about pre-production, shooting, post-production,
translation.zh: ‎要顾及前制、摄制和后制

translation.en: all the different elements that something like Age of Resistance requires.
translation.zh: ‎以及所有不同的元素 ‎这是《抗战纪元》摄制组的要求

translation.en: [Taron] And he's also incredibly laid back and mellow,
translation.zh: ‎他显得非常享受 也待人温和

translation.en: and I think for most people,
translation.zh: ‎多数人不容易理解

translation.en: the task of bringing something like this to life, it's quite hard to comprehend
translation.zh: ‎这种要赋予物件生命的任务

translation.en: the amount of work that goes into this that you don't see.
translation.zh:
‎也不理解幕后的工作量

translation.en: I think what we've never done
translation.zh: ‎我相信没有人

translation.en: is this kind of dance between the camera and the puppets.
translation.zh: ‎曾在镜头和布偶之间舞动

translation.zh: ‎不会经常提醒布偶师镜头在哪里

translation.en: and then having the characters be able to interact with a moving camera.

translation.zh: ‎观众也可以打从心底感受到他的能量

translation.zh: ‎这绝对是路易的作品

translation.zh: ‎他是驱动者和管理者

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎演员会出现 他们要围剿整个村庄

translation.zh: ‎接着大家聚在一起

translation.zh: ‎总共有18、19个人

translation.zh: ‎莱恩就不断往后 像这样

translation.zh: ‎我做梦也没想到

translation.zh: ‎路易莱特里尔将为整部剧集掌镜

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:
‎但好处是
‎我们可以通过一个人目光拍摄

translation.en: It's quite tough.
translation.zh: ‎不容易

translation.zh: ‎我只是负责摄影

translation.zh: ‎路易要掌镜、剪辑

translation.zh: ‎协助写剧本和制作

translation.en: You know, he's kind of... All of this is kind of...
translation.zh: ‎包山包海

translation.en: Yeah, it's a lot.
translation.zh: ‎工作量太大了

translation.en: He's got to take the vision that Jim Henson had,
translation.zh: ‎他要把吉姆汉森的愿景

translation.en: continue that, and then put his own stamp on it.
translation.zh: ‎传承下去 然后贴上自己的标签

translation.en: He's obviously developed an incredible knowledge
translation.zh: ‎他显然已经非常清楚

translation.en: about how the creatures work, the puppets work.
translation.zh: ‎该怎么处理这些怪兽和布偶

translation.en: He's often suggesting ways that they can make-- improve the puppets and improve the creatures
translation.zh:
‎他提出的建议
‎总是能够提升布偶和怪兽的表现

translation.en: that I find quite fascinating, considering that's not his traditional background.
translation.zh:
‎我认为非常不可思议
‎毕竟他没有正规布偶艺术的背景

translation.en: He's not afraid that they're puppets, which sounds a bizarre thing.
translation.zh: ‎他不担心这些布偶 ‎这是非常奇怪的事

translation.en: You work on many shows and things where it's,
translation.zh: ‎你拍摄过许多作品 可是这部剧集…

translation.en: "Well, it's a puppet, it's going to do this, and it's gonna be a problem."
translation.zh:
‎“主角是布偶 会有麻烦
‎肯定会出状况”

translation.en: But when a character walks into a room,
translation.zh: ‎可是每次某个人物登场时

translation.en: he and Erik, they shoot it as if it was a human actor.
translation.zh:
‎他和艾瑞克只管拍摄
‎好像布偶是个人类演员似的

translation.en: If he doesn't like something, he'll tell you what he thinks it should be.
translation.zh:
‎如果他不满意 ‎他会说出自己的想法
‎也会描绘出该有的面貌

translation.en: He can describe what it should be rather than, "No, show me something else."
translation.zh:
‎他会说出自己的想法
‎也会描绘出该有的面貌 ‎而不是说：“不行 换个新的”

translation.en: It's, like, "No, but how about this?"
translation.zh: ‎他会说：“不行 不如这样吧”

translation.en: And his ideas are brilliant,
translation.zh: ‎他的想法非常有用

translation.en: and he has given us loads of ideas
translation.zh: ‎他为我们提供了许多想法

translation.en: of how things could look and how they could be.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我们正确的面貌、要怎么做到

translation.en: [Javier] We're in this hybrid place
translation.zh: ‎这是个复杂的情况

translation.en: where we're neither a feature, nor a television show,
translation.zh:
‎这不是一部剧情片
‎也不是一部电视连续剧

translation.en: and having somebody like Louis at the top of that,
translation.zh: ‎加上有一个像路易这样的领导

translation.en: the way that he works made it really possible for us to create freely.
translation.zh: ‎他的作风让我们得以自由发挥

translation.en: We knew what we could write that was gonna get on screen,
translation.zh:
‎我们知道自己能写什么
‎确保这些内容能搬上屏幕

translation.en: because we knew the guy who was gonna be shooting it.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们了解负责拍摄的那个人

translation.en: He was there in the room with us, you know.
translation.zh: ‎他跟我们一起开会

translation.en: [Cameron] There's a certain type of director that is good with these big, big, massive projects,
translation.zh: ‎某些导演懂得怎么驾驭大型项目

translation.en: and he's just one of those. There's like a handful of them.
translation.zh: ‎他就是其中一个 这种导演不多

translation.en: [Simon] Louis Leterrier has made, essentially, five feature films
translation.zh: ‎路易莱特里尔拍过五部剧情片

translation.en: and they're all gonna drop at once and form this expansive prequel
translation.zh: ‎他要放下过去的经验 ‎为一部30年前的电影拍摄大型前传

translation.en: to a film that came out 30-odd years ago.
translation.zh: ‎为一部30年前的电影拍摄大型前传

translation.en: It's brilliant. It's so amazing, and it's gonna blow people away, you know.
translation.zh: ‎厉害 太不可思议了 ‎肯定会令观众大开眼界

translation.en: Those are the risks that need to be taken.
translation.zh: ‎当然有些风险避免不了

translation.en: You can't... If you're safe all the time, everything gets very beige.
translation.zh:
‎如果每次都安然无恙
‎就会显得单调无味

translation.en: [Peter] The thread that keeps it all going was Louis,
translation.zh: ‎路易是推动我们继续前进的动力

translation.en: and I also like to think the fact that it is Dark Crystal,
translation.zh:
‎我也相信是吉姆和布莱恩
‎为《黑水晶》注入的灵魂

translation.en: the spiritual thread comes right from Jim all the way through, and Brian as well.
translation.zh: ‎转移到我们身上 推动我们继续前进

translation.en: I like the darkness that's embraced with The Dark Crystal.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢《黑水晶》的这种黑暗格调

translation.en: I really do. I think sometimes we can sanitize
translation.zh: ‎我认为现代孩子和年轻人

translation.en: and spoon-feed children and young adults a bit too much.
translation.zh: ‎有时太受保护 也懒得思考

translation.en: [Taron] Something about that period in the '80s
meant that there was a spate of films that were kind of tinged with darkness.
translation.zh: ‎出现大量黑暗格调的电影

translation.en: Not gratuitously so...
translation.zh: ‎不一定有什么大道理

translation.en: -just sort of something... -[growls] a little dangerous and other-worldly.
translation.zh: ‎只是比较危险和脱俗的风格

translation.en: I make a point of showing films to my daughter
translation.zh: ‎我决定让我女儿看一些

translation.en: that I think that she should see,
translation.zh: ‎我认为她应该看的电影

translation.en: so I took her through all the Amblin movies
translation.zh: ‎我给她看安培林发行的电影

translation.en: and we watched all the formative movies of my childhood,
translation.zh: ‎我们一起看那些陪着我长大的电影

translation.en: one of which was Dark Crystal.
translation.zh: ‎其中一部就是《黑水晶》

translation.en: She watched it and really liked it. It frightened the life out of her.
translation.zh: ‎她看了非常喜欢 ‎也被吓坏了

translation.en: [Javier] The alchemy of working with creatures
translation.zh: ‎这是一部我们小时候熟悉的电影

translation.en: in a story that we all knew as kids,
translation.zh: ‎与电影中的怪兽一起工作

translation.en: that has this amazing mythical resonance for us...
translation.zh: ‎都能感受到某种神奇的共鸣感

translation.en: The puppets can be satirical, the puppets can be emotional,
translation.zh:
‎这些布偶极尽冷嘲热讽之能事
‎有时又充满情绪

translation.en: the puppets can say things we never got to say to our parents, what we wish we had.
translation.zh:
‎它们能说出我们不可能对父母说
‎却希望说出的话

translation.en: Or that our parents never got to say to us but we wish they had.
translation.zh:
‎或是父母不可能对我们说
‎却希望他们说出的话

translation.en: [Jason] I've been shocked lots of times, not just once or twice,
translation.zh: ‎我被吓着很多次了 ‎不只是一、两次

translation.en: that this is going to go out and be watched by families
translation.zh: ‎这可是一部阖家观赏的电影

translation.en: because it's sometimes very dark, and very disturbing,
translation.zh: ‎但有时太黑暗、太残忍

translation.en: and very edgy.
translation.zh: ‎太前卫了

translation.en: And if it was live human beings, you might shy away from some things they're doing.
translation.zh: ‎但换成真人演出 ‎有些动作观众可能闭起眼睛不看了

translation.en: But then I remind myself how dark Grimm's Fairy Tales are, and very...
translation.zh: ‎我想到格林童话有多黑暗

translation.en: and how... how resilient children are,
translation.zh: ‎现代孩子的适应力有多强

translation.en: and how we over-protect them,
translation.zh: ‎家长是怎么过度保护他们

translation.en: uh, and the power of narrative like this.
translation.zh: ‎以及这种叙事方式的影响力

translation.en: But it's... it's certainly not a gentle touch.
translation.zh: ‎但绝对不会令人感到舒服

translation.en: [Natalie] It's cathartic as well.
translation.zh: ‎剧情激昂

translation.en: The highs are high, the lows are low.
translation.zh: ‎跌宕起伏

translation.en: I like the darkness of the original Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢原版《黑水晶》里的黑暗格调

translation.en: and the ethos of that has bled into our prequel.
translation.zh: ‎这种精神也融入了这部前传中

translation.en: We have a real respect for the younger audience,
translation.zh: ‎我们非常相信年轻观众的能力

translation.en: which is that you don't have to shield them from everything uncomfortable.
translation.zh:
‎我们大可不必不让孩子们接触
‎所有令人不舒服的事

translation.en: You actually have to let people experience some of, like, these grittier aspects of the world that we live in,
translation.zh:
‎而是应该让他们体验
‎这个世界上某些比较真实的层面

translation.en: and maybe the world becomes a little less scary because of that.
translation.zh:
‎也许因为如此
‎世界就不会那么恐怖了

translation.en: [Ted] One of the things that I love about fantasy worlds
translation.zh: ‎幻想世界打破了真实世界里的藩篱

translation.en: is the breakdown of sort of our own world segregations.
translation.zh: ‎这也是我喜欢幻想故事的原因

translation.en: [Halle] So, I love that we have this intellectual, strong female character
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴剧中有个聪明睿智
‎个性坚强的女性角色

translation.en: that actually comes from a political background,
translation.zh: ‎她来自政治背景

translation.en: and yet is able, through her knowledge and her curiosity,
translation.zh: ‎却凭借知识和好奇心

translation.en: to.. to question it and challenge it,
translation.zh: ‎提出质疑和挑战

translation.en: and is smart and strong.
translation.zh: ‎是个冰雪聪明和坚强不屈的角色

translation.en: [Helena] I've never worked on anything where there's been so many brilliant lead female roles,
translation.zh:
‎我不曾参与有这么多女主角的作品
‎这些女性角色都非常出彩

translation.en: and this is packed full.
translation.zh: ‎这部戏里都是女性

translation.en: [Vivian] This is the first studio that I've been in
translation.zh: ‎那是我参观的第一个片场

translation.en: where we went to the meetings and we were just looking at all women.
translation.zh: ‎摄制组在里面开会 ‎我们发现到处都是女性工作人员

translation.en: [Natalie] It is feminist insofar, and I mean that in a sense of equality.
translation.zh:
‎某种程度上
‎这确实是性别平权的象征

translation.en: It's actually scary that message is still necessary and relevant now
translation.zh:
‎30年前要传达的信息
‎放到现代依然不能少 也没过时

translation.en: actually, 30 years on.
translation.zh: ‎想起来就觉得可怕

translation.en: You'd like to think that that would be historical
translation.zh: ‎我们以为那是以前的事

translation.en: but it's not, it's still contemporary.
translation.zh: ‎其实不是 放在现代依然管用

translation.en: [Javier] Each clan has its own Maudra,
translation.zh: ‎七大氏族有各自的莫德

translation.en: and then there was an All-Maudra over all of them.
translation.zh: ‎以莫德长老为首

translation.en: It is a maternally-driven society.
translation.zh: ‎那个世界是一个母权社会

translation.en: The Spriton bless the All-Maudra.
translation.zh: ‎斯派顿氏族祝福莫德长老

translation.en: [Javier] And ultimately, that's the magic of The Dark Crystal
translation.zh: ‎这就是《黑水晶》的魅力

translation.en: is a group of people,
translation.zh: ‎有一群人

translation.en: all of them brought their A-creative-game to this thing
translation.zh: ‎把他们最厉害的创意

translation.en: at every level, from design, production, writing, direction,
translation.zh: ‎融入设计、制作 ‎编剧和拍摄的每个层面

translation.en: and every time you see one unit of what they created,
translation.zh: ‎他们所创造的每一幕戏

translation.en: everything implies the existence of a great universe behind it,
translation.zh: ‎都牵连到存在于幕后的一个大世界

translation.en: and you get to, in your own mind, go and live in that universe
translation.zh: ‎我们想象自己活在那个世界中

translation.en: for as long as you want.
translation.zh: ‎想待多久就待多久

translation.en: [Toby] We brought everything we could,
translation.zh: ‎该有的都有了

translation.en: the skills, the imagination, the technique um, from truly, you know, astounding artists.
translation.zh:
‎我们用上顶尖艺术家的手艺
‎想象力和技术

translation.en: [Taron] Ninety-five percent of this production
translation.zh: ‎百分之九十的摄制手法

translation.en: has been created in exactly the same way that Jim Henson's original film was,
translation.zh:
‎都是按照当年
‎吉姆汉森创作原版电影的手法

translation.en: and that was very important to me as a fan of the original,
translation.zh:
‎作为原版电影的粉丝
‎这点对我来说十分重要

translation.en: and I think the fact that Netflix, Louis, the Hensons,
translation.zh: ‎我认为Netflix、路易、汉森一家

translation.en: everyone's been very committed to that authentic way of making the series.
translation.zh:
‎以及每个工作人员
‎都在努力将原创的精神保留下来

translation.en: I think it's wonderful to re-visit something that Jim did 35 years ago,
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴能重新
‎回顾吉姆35年前的作品

translation.en: which was, you know, one of the most remarkable things that he ever achieved.
translation.zh: ‎那部电影也是他最大的成就

translation.en: [Lisa] I'm so proud because I really believe it does look like the feature.
translation.zh:
‎我感到非常骄傲
‎我相信这部剧集跟原版长片一样

translation.en: It looks, in some cases, like more than the feature,
translation.zh: ‎在某些方面比原版电影丰富

translation.en: because we're doing so many more locations,
translation.zh: ‎因为我们设计了更多布景

translation.en: and more... more clans, more different types of Gelflings.
translation.zh: ‎更多氏族 ‎更多不同的葛弗林人

translation.en: We have dozens and dozens of puppets this time around,
translation.zh: ‎也用上了数之不尽的布偶

translation.en: so, it's really big.
translation.zh: ‎是个大制作

translation.en: And I'm happy that not only we could make it like the feature,
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴我们不只办到了

translation.en: but we could make it even... even bigger.
translation.zh: ‎还把格局变大了

translation.en: And I think it's just great that my sister Lisa,
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴我姐丽莎

translation.en: you know, picked up the torch and has carried it through
translation.zh: ‎愿意举起火炬

translation.en: to the most extraordinary end point.
translation.zh: ‎带着它跑到最精彩的终点线

translation.en: Its exciting to have brought puppetry to this point.
translation.zh:
‎能把布偶戏带到这个层面上
‎我感到非常高兴

translation.en: My own kids have always been a part of, uh, the creative process, I suppose.
translation.zh: ‎在我创作的过程中 ‎我的孩子们都有参与

translation.en: Uh, my oldest two daughters have always been people that I can bounce a lot of things off of.
translation.zh:
‎我两个大女儿
‎经常听我天马行空地说故事

translation.en: It's kind of the most exciting challenge that we've tackled so far.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们经历过最振奋人心的挑战

translation.en: [Toby] And I think Jim Henson would have just been delighted
translation.zh: ‎我相信吉姆汉森会喜欢

translation.en: by... by the iconography of this
translation.zh: ‎这种画面呈现方式

translation.en: and how strange it is. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎以及这种怪异格调

translation.en: This is such a wonderful moment,
